settings.nothing_found_message: It seems we can’t find what you’re looking for.

settings.html:
<script>

jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
    function sortVariations() {
        $('.product-variations').each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            var terms = $this.text().split(', ').map(term => term.trim());
            
            terms.sort(function(a, b) {
                function parseRange(term) {
                    const match = term.match(/^(\d+)-(\d+)-mnd|^(\d+)$/);
                    if (match) {
                        if (match[3]) return [parseInt(match[3]), parseInt(match[3])];
                        return [parseInt(match[1]), parseInt(match[2])];
                    }
                    return [Infinity, Infinity];
                }
                
                const [aStart, aEnd] = parseRange(a);
                const [bStart, bEnd] = parseRange(b);
                
                return aStart - bStart || aEnd - bEnd;
            });
            
            // Replace '-mnd' with ' mnd'
            terms = terms.map(term => term.replace('-mnd', ' mnd'));
            
            $this.text(terms.join(', '));
        });
        
    }
    
    // sortVariations();
    // $(document).on('yith_wcan_ajax_filtered', sortVariations);
    // $(document).on('wc_fragments_refreshed', sortVariations);
    
    // Function to initialize "Show More" functionality
   function initShowMore() {
        // Unbind previous click events to prevent multiple bindings
        $('.show-more-link').off('click');

        $('.show-more-link').each(function() {
            const $showMoreLink = $(this);
            const $container = $showMoreLink.closest('.category-container');
            const $showMoreContainer = $showMoreLink.closest('.show-more');
            const $arrow = $showMoreLink.find('.arrow');
            let isExpanded = false; // Ensure this starts as false

            // Get the total number of categories from the data attribute
            const totalCategories = parseInt($showMoreContainer.data('total-categories'), 10);

            // Determine if we're on mobile (less than 768px)
            const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 767px)').matches;
            const visibleCount = isMobile ? 4 : 8; // 4 on mobile, 8 on desktop
            const hiddenCount = totalCategories - visibleCount; // Number of hidden categories

            // Select all items that are hidden (either by hidden-mobile or hidden-desktop)
            const $hiddenItems = $container.find('.category-item.hidden-mobile, .category-item.hidden-desktop');

            // Hide the "Show More" link if there are no additional categories to show
            if (hiddenCount <= 0) {
                $showMoreContainer.addClass('hidden');
                console.log('No additional categories to show, hiding Show More link. Total categories:', totalCategories);
                return; // Exit the loop for this instance
            } else {
                $showMoreContainer.removeClass('hidden');
            }

            // Ensure hidden items are hidden on initialization
            $hiddenItems.removeClass('visible');

            // Set initial text and arrow with the correct count
            $showMoreLink.contents().filter(function() {
                return this.nodeType === 3; // Text node
            }).replaceWith(`Vis alle ${hiddenCount} kategorier `);
            $arrow.text('▼');

            // Debugging: Log the state
            console.log('Initializing Show More, isExpanded:', isExpanded);
            console.log('Total categories:', totalCategories);
            console.log('Visible count:', visibleCount);
            console.log('Hidden count:', hiddenCount);
            console.log('Hidden items:', $hiddenItems);

            $showMoreLink.on('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                console.log('Show More link clicked, isExpanded:', isExpanded);
                console.log('Device width:', window.innerWidth);
                console.log('Is mobile (max-width: 767px):', window.matchMedia('(max-width: 767px)').matches);

                if (!isExpanded) {
                    // Show all hidden items by adding the 'visible' class
                    $hiddenItems.addClass('visible');
                    // Update link text and arrow
                    $showMoreLink.contents().filter(function() {
                        return this.nodeType === 3; // Text node
                    }).replaceWith('Vis færre kategorier ');
                    $arrow.text('▲');
                    isExpanded = true;
                    console.log('Expanded, showing all items. Hidden items now:', $hiddenItems);
                    console.log('Visible items count:', $container.find('.category-item.visible').length);
                } else {
                    // Hide items by removing the 'visible' class
                    $hiddenItems.removeClass('visible');
                    // Update link text and arrow with the correct count
                    $showMoreLink.contents().filter(function() {
                        return this.nodeType === 3; // Text node
                    }).replaceWith(`Vis alle ${hiddenCount} kategorier `);
                    $arrow.text('▼');
                    isExpanded = false;
                    console.log('Collapsed, hiding extra items. Hidden items now:', $hiddenItems);
                    console.log('Visible items count:', $container.find('.category-item.visible').length);
                }
            });
        });
    }
    // Initial calls
    sortVariations();
    initShowMore();
$(document).on('yith_wcan_ajax_filtered', function() {
        sortVariations();
        initShowMore();
    });

    $(document).on('wc_fragments_refreshed', function() {
        sortVariations();
        initShowMore();
    });

    // Re-run on window resize to handle dynamic screen size changes
    $(window).on('resize', function() {
        initShowMore();
    });
});

</script>
